# Introduction to working with data in R and wrangling factors

This week we'll learn how to work with spreadsheet-like data in R. We'll also spend some time on how to be the boss of your factors. 

---

`r emo::ji("memo")` Prepare:

* Install the `nycflights13` package. This data set is on all flights out of the three major airports in NYC from 2013. There are multiple data sets contained within this package that are used in the homework.
